channel.title: Luke – My Best Photography
channel.description: All Photos Taken By Me, Luke

item.title: Sunny Day Horse
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description: This was taken October 23, 2023 in my backyard while the new horses grassed and relaxed.
item.content:encoded: This was taken October 23, 2023 in my backyard while the new horses grassed and relaxed.

item.title: 2024 Solar Eclipse
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description: This was taken on April 8, 2024 at 3:12 pm in my backyard during the solar eclipse.
item.content:encoded: This was taken on April 8, 2024 at 3:12 pm in my backyard during the solar eclipse.

item.title: Winter Afternoon Chickadee
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description: This was taken on February 21, 2024 on a cold winter afternoon. Also, it just so happened to be taken two years to the day from this photo.
item.content:encoded: This was taken on February 21, 2024 on a cold winter afternoon. Also, it just so happened to be taken two years to the day from this photo.

item.title: First Crocus Of The Season
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description: This photo was taken on March 7, 2024 when I was going on a walk to see the first signs of spring.
item.content:encoded: This photo was taken on March 7, 2024 when I was going on a walk to see the first signs of spring.

item.title: Log At Lake Erie
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description:
This photo, like many of my best, was taken at lake Erie on February 20, 2023. This one doesn’t have a cool story or fancy techniques, but rather has some good editing. The original sky was mostly blank white because the sun was shining brightly directly behind the clouds. With some intense editing and many …

Continue reading "Log At Lake Erie"
item.content:encoded: This photo, like many of my best, was taken at lake Erie on February 20, 2023. This one doesn’t have a cool story or fancy techniques, but rather has some good editing. The original sky was mostly blank white because the sun was shining brightly directly behind the clouds. With some intense editing and many revisions, I finished with this.

item.title: Sunset Boat
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description:
This was taken May 13, 2023, at an Airbnb on lake Erie. It was (as you can see) an amazing sunset with a boat that was basically asking to have its photo taken. This photo got a blue at the local fair with a possible state fair, but the fair has a limit to two …

Continue reading "Sunset Boat"
item.content:encoded:
This was taken May 13, 2023, at an Airbnb on lake Erie. It was (as you can see) an amazing sunset with a boat that was basically asking to have its photo taken.

This photo got a blue at the local fair with a possible state fair, but the fair has a limit to two photos per person that can go to state fair and I had two others that went instead. Those two others are later in the list and labeled in the description of the photos.

item.title: Red Tailed Hawk
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description:
This picture was taken August 29, 2022, in my backyard. It was seen by a family member and I was soon notified. So out I went in the drizzling rain with my camera and an umbrella. I took hundreds of photos while it flew around from spot to spot. Finally, it landed in a good …

Continue reading "Red Tailed Hawk"
item.content:encoded:
This picture was taken August 29, 2022, in my backyard. It was seen by a family member and I was soon notified. So out I went in the drizzling rain with my camera and an umbrella. I took hundreds of photos while it flew around from spot to spot. Finally, it landed in a good spot and I took this gem of a photo.

To top it off, this was the second of the two photos to go to state fair this year. But instead of getting a red at state fair, this one got a perfect score and a purple ribbon.

item.title: Lake Erie Pathway
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description:
This one, as the name suggests, was taken at lake Erie on February 20, 2023, just like the last one. Again, the story wasn’t as good as the edit. The original photo had no left side rail and I had to add it in post using the rail on the right. To add to the …

Continue reading "Lake Erie Pathway"
item.content:encoded:
This one, as the name suggests, was taken at lake Erie on February 20, 2023, just like the last one. Again, the story wasn’t as good as the edit. The original photo had no left side rail and I had to add it in post using the rail on the right. To add to the difficulty of making the rail, the right rail is in the sun and the left is not, I had to remove highlights and fix shadows.

I almost forgot, this was one of the ones that went to state fair. Even though I thought that the sunset one was better this one, this went and got a red because the judge said that they liked it more without the edited rail for symmetry.

item.title: Little Downy Woodpecker
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description: This was taken November 30, 2023 in the woods after the leaves had fallen off the trees.
item.content:encoded: This was taken November 30, 2023 in the woods after the leaves had fallen off the trees.

item.title: Dim Light Sauna
item.dc:creator: Luke
item.description: This was taken October 26, 2023 at an air BnB during the night when the only thing lighting the sauna was the light on the inside.
item.content:encoded: This was taken October 26, 2023 at an air BnB during the night when the only thing lighting the sauna was the light on the inside.
